translations: n.（Kipper）人名；（德、法、俄）基佩尔；（英）基珀

phrs.translation: 腌鱼, 或腌鱼, 干鳟鱼, 奇葩族

sentences.sentence: Kippers can be enjoyed at any time though, and make a great item to throw on a barbecue.
sentences.translation: 而现在任何人都可以在任何时间享用腌鱼，特别是在烧烤中最常见。

sentences.sentence: People of the Dong ethnic group in Hunan province have the custom of making kippers during Cold Dew.
sentences.translation: 在寒露时节制腌鱼是湖南侗家人的习俗。
